title: Review: Delta Cycle’s hexAir saddle covers cushion those in-between rides
content:
While we love to ride fast on every ride, we’re not always stoked on pressing a firm performance saddle between our legs on a quick ride to the store. Especially when riding in normal shorts, not Spandex. Fortunately, the Delta Cycles hexAir saddle covers take all of five seconds to slip over our racing saddles, […]

The post Review: Delta Cycle’s hexAir saddle covers cushion those in-between rides appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
